QuestData.Title: Kodo Hide Bag
QuestData.Description: The kodo beasts of Mulgore are strong and sturdy -- traits much respected among us. If you are skilled in leatherworking and wish the knowledge to make a Kodo Hide Bag, then bring me supplies for my trade.$B$BDo this, and I will share my knowledge with you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 4 Light Leather and 4 Coarse Thread to Veren Tallstrider in Thunder Bluff.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, good. Thank you, $N. My heart swells with pride to see youths interested in the craft of leatherworking.
